participant_1.background: my father drove a car for nascar. my favorite color is grey. i am employed by the us postal service. i'm terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby.

participant_2.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text: The BMW S1000RR, the world's most powerful road bike.
